page.title: 13Recreation in East Leicester
page.content:
{Spinney Hill Park:}This is a large open-area well used by families living the area. Facilities include cricket pitches,tennis courts,crazy golf,out- door chess,adventure playground & a children's playground which includes some animals. Each year there is a fair in the park to celebrate the Muslim festival of Eid.
{Monk's Rest Park: Humberstone:}This is in the grounds of the Old Vicarage & provides a number of outdoor sporting facilities for the public. These include bowls & tennis. In addition there are extensive,well-kept gardens used by the people of Humberstone. The old house is used in a number of different ways but is rapidly falling into disrepair.
